channel.title: ASF JIRA

item.title: [BEAM-6639] ClickHouseIOTest flakey failure failing in precomiits

item.summary: ClickHouseIOTest flakey failure failing in precomiits

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: kanterov is there a dupe of this? I've seen action on dealing with the ClickHouseIO container before but this was the Jira I managed to search up.
kenn I think so, in any case, the issue is supposed to be resolved, and should be re-opened if it isn't.
